description:
You are in the dashboard.
Login via [bookingflix.com/en/sign-in.html](https://bookingflix.com/en/sign-in.html)

1. Click first on ***Profile*** and then on ***Statistics***.
2. Click on ***Calculate statistics***.
3. The statistics tool shows you the following data:
* Total appointment booking history
* Appointments by calendar
* Appointments by time
* Appointments by service
* Appointments by day of the week
* When the booking was made
* Appointment booking history by day

The data is displayed graphically, in percentages and in absolute values.
Updating takes place immediately.
title: Statistics on previous bookings
